text: "Kayleigh" is a 1985 song by British progressive rock band Marillion. It is the leading single from their third studio album Misplaced Childhood. It went to number 2 in both the United Kingdom and France, number 88 in Australia, number 74 in the United States, number 25 in Italy, number 4 in Ireland, number 12 in the Netherlands, number 7 in Germany and number 8 in Norway. ==Track listing== ===International 7" version === ====Side 1==== #"Kayleigh" – 3:33 ====Side 2==== #"Lady Nina" – 3:41 ===US 7" version (Capitol Records) === ====Side 1==== #"Kayleigh" – 3:33 ====Side 2==== #"Heart of Lothian" – 3:47 ===12" versions=== ====Side 1==== #"Kayleigh" [Alternative Mix] – 3:57 #"Kayleigh" [Extended Version] – 4:00 ====Side 2==== #"Lady Nina" [Extended Version] – 5:46 ===Cassette single=== #"Kayleigh" [Alternative Mix] – 3:57 #"Kayleigh" [Extended Version] – 4:00 #"Lady Nina" [Extended Version] – 5:46 #"Lady Nina" [Single Edit] – 3:41 ===Marillion - The Singles "82-88"=== #"Kayleigh" – 3:33 #"Lady Nina" – 3:41 #"Kayleigh" [Alternative Mix] – 3:57 #"Kayleigh" [Extended Version] – 4:00 #"Lady Nina" [Extended Version] – 5:46 ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Marillion songs
title: Kayleigh
